article.title: Wyle Labs Receives Contract for RIAC Work
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Wyle Laboratories Incorporated has received a $19 million contract for the Reliability Information Analysis Center (RIAC) to research, test, develop and deliver engineering and technology assessment reports, standards and specification reports, configuration assessment reports, feasibility assessment reports, and interoperability test reports for the secure site technology analysis, upgrades, installation and testing project.
